rooms.description: Entrance hall with Vastu-aligned placement to welcome positive energy; minimalistic design.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to let in natural light; Scandinavian aesthetics with clean lines and neutral tones.
Adjacent to the living room; includes a dining table and seating designed for family meals.
Dedicated home office with soundproofing and ample workspace; incorporates Scandinavian simplicity and functionality.
Modern bathroom with water-efficient fixtures; Vastu-compliant placement for wellness.
Master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and a spacious balcony; Scandinavian style and ample storage.
Balcony adjacent to the master bedroom; designed for relaxation and fresh air.

openings.description: Door opening aligned with Vastu principles for smooth flow of energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light and enhancing the Scandinavian aesthetic.
Door that connects the home office to the living area for easy access while maintaining privacy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the master bedroom, paired with a balcony opening ensuring Vastu compliance.

rooms.description: Second bedroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity and functional layout; includes a private balcony.
Balcony adjacent to the second bedroom for additional outdoor space and light.

openings.description: Staircase designed with Vastu considerations, providing a safe and efficient transition between levels.
Door leading from the bedroom to its balcony ensuring easy access and adherence to Scandinavian design principles.
